title: Right clicks mostly unresponsive?
body: Since yesterday 4/5 of my right clicks for moving/attacking just don't register, at times it gets so bad that I just cant move for several seconds. My mouse otherwise appears to be fully functioning and this problem occurred rather suddenly. I tried replugging in my mouse, that doesn't work. When I bound movement to a certain key it worked fine, but I obviously can't play league like that. Do any of you know about this problem and how to fix it?

replies.body: The issue has resolved, I just changed mouses and it works. Unfortunately, I now have to get used to its smaller size.

So everything else functions properly when this happens, such as keybindings for your champion spells and summoner spells. There's no delay in you, other champs, or minion movements during these periods?

Everyonce in a while I get this problem and it doesn't matter if I use my mouse or my touchpad. I'm not lagging I can cast my spells as normal but can't do anything pertaining to rightt clicking. It usually fixes itself and its not common and luckily hasn't ever happened in a intense moment.
Same, been having the same problem or similar problem where i click to move my champions and doesnt respond, whereas others are moving
